casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tae Kwon HAMMONDS 389A15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 13, 2016 Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hammonds, Tae Kwon. Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. John R. Rittelmeyer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Disability Rights North Carolina, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of October 2016 by Defendant for Revision of Briefing Deadlines:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of October 2016."
